name: Rube Goldberg Machine (Shugo16)
description:
This is my first project for the intro to Game Programming class. 

This is a Rube Goldberg Machine, and the goal was to play around with the physics built in Unity. I decided to keep it relatively simple with a catapult that launches a ball which leads to a bunch of dominos being knocked over, followed by a bowling ball ending! In the future, I want to try building AI elements and building full-fledged games using Unity. I am excited to see more of the tools it offers!
